value.title: DML without limits, now in BigQuery
value.excerpt: Data manipulation language (DML) statements in BigQuery, such as INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE, and MERGE, enable users to add, modify, and delete data stored in BigQuery, Google Cloud’s enterprise data warehouse. DML in BigQuery supports inserting, updating, or deleting an arbitrarily large number of rows
